translations: n.插图画家（illustrator 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 插图画家, 说明性动作, 插画师
插画家协会, 插画师协会, 插图画家协会
韩国矢量素材, 时尚人物
制图师, 平面设计师和插图画家, 图解者

sentences.sentence: Illustrators design fonts and images for a variety of media, from Web sites to print campaigns and videos.
sentences.translation: 插图画家为网站，印刷广告系列和视频等各种媒体设计字体和图像。

sentences.sentence: During her tenure here The Atlantic has won more than 300 awards for visual excellence, from the Society of illustrators and so on.
sentences.translation: 在她任职期间，《大西洋》获得了超过300个视觉卓越奖，来自插图画家协会等。

sentences.sentence: Very few designers are also great illustrators.
sentences.translation: 很少有设计师同时也是插画师。
